description: Marine Headquarters, the primary base of operations for the Marines and the site of the Summit War between the Marines and the Whitebeard Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Koby
keyEvents.description: Koby confronts Luffy on the battlefield at Marineford but is quickly defeated, showing the vast difference in their power.
keyEvents.significance: A pivotal moment demonstrating how far both characters have come since Episode 1.

keyEvents.title: Hancock Destroys Pacifista
keyEvents.description: Boa Hancock destroys a Pacifista at Marineford to protect Luffy, openly betraying her Warlord position.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Hancock's complete commitment to Luffy over her duty to the World Government.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Conqueror's Haki Awakens
keyEvents.description: Luffy unleashes his Conqueror's Haki at Marineford, knocking out the executioners and stopping Ace's execution at the last second.
keyEvents.significance: The first clear manifestation of Luffy's Conqueror's Haki, marking him as possessing the qualities of a king and shocking all the world's most powerful individuals present.

statusHistory.reason: The Summit War at Marineford reaches its climax
